original_text: The crowd spoke up, “We have heard from the Law that the Messiah will remain forever, so how can you say, ‘The Son of Man must be lifted up’? Who is this ‘Son of Man’?”
korean_text: 이에 무리가 대답하되 우리는 율법에서 그리스도가 영원히 계신다 함을 들었거늘 너는 어찌하여 인자가 들려야 하리라 하느냐 이 인자는 누구냐

sentences.original_text: We have heard from the Law
that the Messiah will remain forever

sentences.korean_translation: 그런데 어찌 당신은 말할 수 있는가

sentences.original_text: The Son of Man must be lifted up
